Structs/CommandInput.html#/s:7Command0A5.name: arguments
Structs/CommandInput.html#/s:7Command0A5.abstract: The CommandInput’s raw arguments. This array will be mutated as arguments and options

Structs/CommandInput.html#/s:7Command0A5.name: parse(option:)
Structs/CommandInput.html#/s:7Command0A5.abstract: Parses the option from input, returning nil if it could

Structs/CommandInput.html#/s:7Command0A5.name: parse(argument:)
Structs/CommandInput.html#/s:7Command0A5.abstract: Parses the argument from input, returning nil if it could not be found.

Structs/CommandContext.html#/s:7Command0.name: container
Structs/CommandContext.html#/s:7Command0.abstract: The container this command is running on.

Structs/CommandContext.html#/s:7Command0.name: requireOption(_:)
Structs/CommandContext.html#/s:7Command0.abstract: Requires an option, returning the value or throwing.

Structs/CommandContext.html#/s:7Command0.name: argument(_:)
Structs/CommandContext.html#/s:7Command0.abstract: Accesses an argument by name. This will only throw if

Structs/Commands.html#/s:7Command8Comman.name: commands
Structs/Commands.html#/s:7Command8Comman.abstract: Top-level available commands, stored by unique name.

Structs/Commands.html#/s:7Command8Comman.name: defaultCommand
Structs/Commands.html#/s:7Command8Comman.abstract: If set, this is the default top-level command that should run if no other commands are specified.

Structs/Commands.html#/s:7Command8Comman.name: init(commands:defaultCommand:)
Structs/Commands.html#/s:7Command8Comman.abstract: Creates a new ConfiguredCommands struct. This is usually done by calling resolve(for:) on CommandConfig.

Structs/CommandConfig.html#/s:7Command0A.name: use(_:as:isDefault:)
Structs/CommandConfig.html#/s:7Command0A.abstract: Adds a CommandRunnable type to the config. This type will be lazily initialized later using a Container.

Structs/CommandConfig.html#/s:7Command0A.name: resolve(for:)
Structs/CommandConfig.html#/s:7Command0A.abstract: Resolves the configured commands to a ConfiguredCommands struct.

Structs/CommandArgument.html#/s:7Command.name: help
Structs/CommandArgument.html#/s:7Command.abstract: The arguments’s help text when --help is passed.

Structs/CommandOption.html#/s:7Command0A.name: help
Structs/CommandOption.html#/s:7Command0A.abstract: The option’s help text when --help is passed.

Structs/Commands.html.name: Commands
Structs/Commands.html.abstract: Represents a top-level group of configured commands. This is usually created by calling resolve(for:) on CommandConfig.

Structs/CommandContext.html.name: CommandContext
Structs/CommandContext.html.abstract: Contains required data for running a command such as the Console and CommandInput.

Structs/CommandInput.html.name: CommandInput
Structs/CommandInput.html.abstract: Raw input for commands. Use this to parse options and arguments for the command context.

Protocols/CommandRunnable.html#/s:7Comma.name: help
Protocols/CommandRunnable.html#/s:7Comma.abstract: Text that will be displayed when --help is passed.

Protocols/CommandRunnable.html#/s:7Comma.name: run(using:)
Protocols/CommandRunnable.html#/s:7Comma.abstract: Runs the command against the supplied input.

Protocols/CommandRunnable.html.name: CommandRunnable
Protocols/CommandRunnable.html.abstract: Capable of being run on a Console using Console.run(...).

Protocols/Command.html.name: Command
Protocols/Command.html.abstract: A command that can be run through a Console.

Protocols/CommandGroup.html.name: CommandGroup
Protocols/CommandGroup.html.abstract: A group of named commands that can be run through a Console.

Extensions/Console.html#/s:7Command3runX.name: run(_:input:on:)
Extensions/Console.html#/s:7Command3runX.abstract: Runs a CommandRunnable (CommandGroup or Command) of commands on this Console using the supplied CommandInput.

Extensions/Environment.html#/s:7Command6.name: detect(from:)
Extensions/Environment.html#/s:7Command6.abstract: Detects the environment from CommandInput. Parses the --env flag.

Extensions/Console.html.name: Console
Extensions/Console.html.abstract: Adds the ability to run Commands on a Console.

Enums/CommandOptionType.html#/s:7Command.name: value
Enums/CommandOptionType.html#/s:7Command.abstract: Normal option. Requires a value if supplied and there is no default.

Enums/CommandOptionType.html#/s:7Command.name: flag
Enums/CommandOptionType.html#/s:7Command.abstract: Flag option. Does not support a value. If supplied, the value is true.
